author: China Uncensored
description:
Operation Honey Pot: Paste this emoji 🍯 in your comment below.
Maduro’s capture wasn’t about drugs. It wasn’t even about oil. It was about China. For years, Beijing used Venezuela to expand its influence, intelligence, and power in the Western Hemisphere. Trump’s move didn’t just take down a dictator—it sent a message directly to the CCP. Here’s what everyone else is missing.

Want to go deeper than YouTube will let us? Check out our website: https://chinauncensored.tv

title: Maduro’s Capture Was Never About Oil—It Was About China
